title: Enroll Patient in Support Program
description: A case manager for a patient support program receives a request to enroll a new patient and verify their benefits for a specialty drug.

tasks.description: Receive and log the completed enrollment form from the patient's physician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new patient case and enters their demographic and insurance information.

tasks.description: Perform a benefits verification check with the patient's insurance provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a benefits verification tool and finds the drug is covered but requires prior authorization.

tasks.description: Initiate the prior authorization process on behalf of the physician's office.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the required clinical information to the insurance company.

tasks.description: Inform the patient and physician that the enrollment is pending prior authorization approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a status update notification to the patient and physician.
